<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 500 160">

  <rect x="20" y="15" width="90" height="110" rx="6" fill="#334155"/>
  <rect x="390" y="15" width="90" height="110" rx="6" fill="#334155"/>
  <g id="gate-left">
    <rect x="111" y="25" width="140" height="90" fill="rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.3)" stroke="#6366f1" stroke-width="3" rx="4"/>
  </g>
  <g id="gate-right">
    <rect x="251" y="25" width="140" height="90" fill="rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.3)" stroke="#6366f1" stroke-width="3" rx="4"/>
  </g>
  <text id="gate-status" x="250" y="145" text-anchor="middle" fill="#94a3b8" font-family="sans-serif" font-size="18" font-weight="700">CLOSED</text>
</svg>

targets.rawSql:
WITH today AS (
  SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM person_journeys
  WHERE site = 'netto' AND time >= CURRENT_DATE AND outcome IS NOT NULL
),
yesterday AS (
  SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM person_journeys
  WHERE site = 'netto' AND time >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day'
    AND time < CURRENT_DATE AND outcome IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT today.cnt as today, yesterday.cnt as yesterday,
       CASE WHEN yesterday.cnt > 0 THEN ROUND((today.cnt - yesterday.cnt)::numeric / yesterday.cnt * 100, 1) ELSE 0 END as pct
FROM today, yesterday;

WITH today AS (
  SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM person_journeys
  WHERE site = 'netto' AND time >= CURRENT_DATE AND outcome = 'paid_exit'
),
yesterday AS (
  SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM person_journeys
  WHERE site = 'netto' AND time >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day'
    AND time < CURRENT_DATE AND outcome = 'paid_exit'
)
SELECT today.cnt as today, yesterday.cnt as yesterday
FROM today, yesterday;

WITH today AS (
  SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM person_journeys
  WHERE site = 'netto' AND time >= CURRENT_DATE AND outcome = 'unpaid_exit'
),
yesterday AS (
  SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM person_journeys
  WHERE site = 'netto' AND time >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day'
    AND time < CURRENT_DATE AND outcome = 'unpaid_exit'
)
SELECT today.cnt as today, yesterday.cnt as yesterday
FROM today, yesterday;

WITH today AS (
  SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM person_journeys
  WHERE site = 'netto' AND time >= CURRENT_DATE AND outcome = 'lost_unauthorized'
),
yesterday AS (
  SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM person_journeys
  WHERE site = 'netto' AND time >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day'
    AND time < CURRENT_DATE AND outcome = 'lost_unauthorized'
)
SELECT today.cnt as today, yesterday.cnt as yesterday
FROM today, yesterday;

WITH today AS (
  SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM person_journeys
  WHERE site = 'netto' AND time >= CURRENT_DATE AND tailgated = true
),
yesterday AS (
  SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM person_journeys
  WHERE site = 'netto' AND time >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day'
    AND time < CURRENT_DATE AND tailgated = true
)
SELECT today.cnt as today, yesterday.cnt as yesterday
FROM today, yesterday;

SELECT outcome, COUNT(*) as count
FROM person_journeys
WHERE site = 'netto' AND time > NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours' AND outcome IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY outcome
ORDER BY count DESC;

SELECT
  time_bucket('5 minutes', time) as time,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE data->>'t' = 'matched') as matched,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE data->>'t' = 'unmatched') as unmatched
FROM events
WHERE site = 'netto' AND event_type = 'gateway.acc' AND $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;

WITH hours AS (
  SELECT generate_series(0, 23) as hour
),
today_data AS (
  SELECT EXTRACT(HOUR FROM time AT TIME ZONE 'Atlantic/Reykjavik')::int as hour, COUNT(*) as cnt
  FROM person_journeys
  WHERE site = 'netto' AND time >= CURRENT_DATE AND outcome IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY 1
),
yesterday_data AS (
  SELECT EXTRACT(HOUR FROM time AT TIME ZONE 'Atlantic/Reykjavik')::int as hour, COUNT(*) as cnt
  FROM person_journeys
  WHERE site = 'netto' AND time >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day'
    AND time < CURRENT_DATE AND outcome IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT (CURRENT_DATE + (h.hour || ' hours')::interval) AT TIME ZONE 'Atlantic/Reykjavik' as time,
       COALESCE(t.cnt, 0) as today,
       COALESCE(y.cnt, 0) as yesterday
FROM hours h
LEFT JOIN today_data t ON h.hour = t.hour
LEFT JOIN yesterday_data y ON h.hour = y.hour
ORDER BY h.hour;

panels.title: Exits by Hour: Today vs Yesterday

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time_bucket('1 hour', time) as time,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE outcome = 'paid_exit') as paid_exit,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE outcome = 'unpaid_exit') as unpaid_exit,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE outcome = 'lost_unauthorized') as lost_unauthorized
FROM person_journeys
WHERE site = 'netto' AND $__timeFilter(time) AND outcome IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;

SELECT
  time_bucket('1 hour', time) as time,
  ROUND(COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE outcome = 'paid_exit')::numeric / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0) * 100, 1) as paid_rate
FROM person_journeys
WHERE site = 'netto' AND $__timeFilter(time) AND outcome IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;
